Reviews.Title: Good but does not provide performance expected.
Reviews.Author: ozcani
Reviews.Content: We got this item to replace the 16ch DVR we have. Expecting that this device will provide high-performance in all aspects. Especially we we looking good performance when we play record video in fast-forward mode, it was performing poorly. May be the item we got was defective but anyway it did not provide expected performance. However, I should admit that in terms of functionality that it provides, it is a great product.

ProductInfo.Features:
H.264 Compression; Full D1 Real-time Recording
2ch IP Camera Support; ONVIF Compliance
User-friendly GUI; Frame rate & quality adjustment per channel
2-way Audio Support; Alarm Notification; PTZ Control
Back-up via USB/network/internal DVD-RW; Remote Control and Mouse included
ProductInfo.Name: LG LE5016D-NH 16-Channel H.264 Hybrid D1 Real-Time Recording Security DVR (Black)
